backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, and CRUD operations for clients with detailed client, KYC, and onboarding data types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI features, affected files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH design tokens and light/dark theme variables for the UI.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router routes, authentication gating, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout with sidebar navigation, user profile display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Login gate showing an Internet Identity login button and loading state for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientId: Combines identity documents, KYC screening history, and risk assessment sections using provided mock client data.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientOv: Displays personal info, contact details, and identity documents for a client with formatted fields and expiry statuses.
frontend/src/components/clients/CurrentR: Shows current risk level, factors, and assessment dates with option to initiate new screening.
frontend/src/components/clients/Identity: Renders a list of identity documents with verification and expiry status badges plus an add-document button.
frontend/src/components/clients/KycScree: Table listing past KYC screenings with risk, PEP, sanctions results, and notes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/EditO: Dialog for updating an onboarding card’s stage, status, assignee, and due date with mutation to move client.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Displays a client onboarding card with status, assignee, due date, and an edit dialog trigger.
Normalizes onboarding stages into fixed columns and renders them as a kanban board.
Renders a single onboarding stage column and its client cards or an empty-state message.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/onboa: Defines onboarding stage names and helpers for mapping between names and step numbers.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to enter and save name and email before proceeding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, persistence, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, clients, dashboard stats, and onboarding pipeline mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/mocks/clientDetailMock.ts: Generates deterministic mock client detail data with KYC info, documents, financials, and alerts.
frontend/src/mocks/clientsListMock.ts: Provides a static list of mock ClientProfile objects used as fallback or sample data in the UI.
frontend/src/pages/AddClientPage.tsx: Implements a form for creating new clients, handling submission, validation, and redirect after creation.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed client information with tabs and alerts, fetching data by ID and showing mock supplemental details.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Shows a sortable, searchable client list using backend data or mock data as fallback.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays client statistics and upcoming KYC review deadlines using dashboard and client queries.
frontend/src/pages/KYCScreeningPage.tsx: Stub page providing a header for the KYC screening section.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Renders the onboarding pipeline with loading states, error handling, and a kanban board view.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Stub page showing a header for compliance reports.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Stub page showing a header for application settings.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides date formatting utilities, client ID formatting, status/risk label mapping, and expiry countdown helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Describes the CRM project state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
